很有深度的一堂課，希望一些理論和公式能多給一些連結，方便課後學習。
The class is a little hard for people who doesn’t have any experience in coding.

This class is not adapted for total beginner (which I was), and I think it shouldn't be accessible for them. Also, it was complicated to follow the class for exchanges students, it's difficult to understand in distance.
